Name: Father's Advice
Ingredients: 15 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
15 ml Vermouth amaro - medium (e.g. Cocchi Vermouth Amaro)
15 ml Lustau Amontillado Los Arcos Sherry
7.5 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: USA Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail by Ran Duan, The Baldwin Bar, Sichuan Garden, Woburn, MA.
